original: intros X p H. pose (f := fun x : X => if (Dec (p x)) then true else false). exists f. intros x. split. - intros Hp. unfold f. destruct (Dec (p x)). + reflexivity. + contradiction. - intros Hftrue. unfold f in Hftrue. destruct (Dec (p x)). + apply dec_DN in d. contradiction. + discriminate.
